title: Research
body:
How does algorithmic thinking change science and technology?
How do scientific concepts transform?
The CSS-Lab is dedicated to the understanding of the digital transformation of science. We are developing a conceptual framework for a Philosophy of Computational Sciences and Technology.

title: Tools
body:
How can we explore computational sciences?
 How can we ease the study of computational sciences?
 The CSS-Lab is building up an open science infrastructure for Computational Science Studies. We are programming software tools which help to ease conducting case studies in computational sciences at the level of code studies.
